backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing rooms, messages, moderation (mute/block/ban), reports, and user profiles with admin‑gated actions and storage maps.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old message format to include senderPrincipal and initializing bannedUsers while preserving other actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping admin UI and React Query moderation features to corresponding frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-written summaries describing purposes of all frontend source files, hooks, components, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style definitions including custom OKLCH color tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root router configuration and app layout initialization using TanStack Router, ThemeProvider, and global toast provider.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageActi: Per-message actions menu providing moderation tools, including admin‑gated delete/ban/unban actions and user mute/block/report flows.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageComp: A chat input component handling authentication, profile readiness, validation, and message sending with error states and UI prompts.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageList: Renders a scrollable, moderated chat message list with avatars, timestamps, and action menus, autoscrolling on updates.
Defines the main app layout with header, content area, and bottom navigation tied to router state and area selection.
frontend/src/data/indiaStateCentroids.ts: Provides approximate latitude/longitude centroids for Indian states and union territories used for closest-state calculations.
frontend/src/data/indiaStates.ts: Exports stable IDs and labels for all Indian states and union territories.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAnonProfile.ts: Loads or generates a local anonymous profile and provides an updater that persists changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAreaSelection.ts: Manages stored area selection and geolocation-based auto-selection of the nearest Indian state.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthControls.ts: Wraps Internet Identity auth to provide login/logout helpers, auth state, and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state and loading persisted identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useModeration.ts: Manages muted and blocked users with localStorage persistence and filters messages accordingly.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for rooms, messages, and user actions such as creating rooms, sending messages, and moderation.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Unifies backend and anonymous user profiles, syncing authenticated profiles via React Query with auto‑creation logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and background styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Implements the chat page UI, displaying messages with polling, message composer, and admin room‑deletion controls.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Displays a login screen with Google or Internet Identity sign-in and redirects after authentication.
frontend/src/pages/RoomsPage.tsx: Shows rooms filtered by area and search, and handles creating or joining rooms with auth and area checks.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Manages user settings including area selection, location access, profile updates, and login/logout actions.
Generates, loads, and saves anonymous user profiles with random IDs, nicknames, colors, and avatars.
frontend/src/storage/areaSelectionStorag: Stores and retrieves area-selection settings and exposes a list of all areas including a special 'All areas' option.
frontend/src/utils/auth/isAuthError.ts: Detects authentication-related backend errors by matching common message patterns.
frontend/src/utils/auth/postLoginRedirec: Stores and retrieves a post-login redirect path using sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/location/closestIndia: Computes the nearest Indian state to given coordinates using the Haversine distance algorithm.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, persist, and clear URL parameters from query strings, hash routes, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state describing moderation feature requirements, existing issues, and admin permission model tied to Internet Identity.
